name: Dice Picnic
description:
MOVE : [Left, Right arrow key]

REPLAY : [R]

UNFOLD : [Q,W]

FOLD : [Space]

-------

[GMTK Game Jam 2022]

Today is IDPD (International Dice Picnic Day)!

In this day, every dice in the world will go picnicking with their best friend!

However, there're someone totally forget this big event...

-------

Game Design : Feather Chung (@FeatherLV1)

BGM : Purple Planet Music - Candy Club
